Longoxed Core Module¶

Service Class¶

longboxed.core¶

Core module contains basic classes that all applications depend on

exception longboxed.core.LongboxedError(msg)[source]¶

Base application error class

exception longboxed.core.LongboxedFormError(errors=None)[source]¶

Raise when an error processing a form occurs.

class longboxed.core.Service[source]¶

A Service instance encapsulates common SQLAlchemy model operations in the context of a Flask application.

all()[source]¶

Returns a generator containing all instances of the service’s model.

count()[source]¶

Returns the number of rows in the models table

create(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a new, saved instance of the service’s model class.

Parameters:**kwargs –

instance parameters
delete(model)[source]¶

Immediately deletes the specified model instance.

Parameters:model – the model instance to delete
find(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a list of instances of the service’s model filtered by the specified key word arguments.

Parameters:**kwargs –

filter parameters
first(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns the first instance found of the service’s model filtered by the specified key word arguments.

Parameters:**kwargs –

filter parameters
first_or_404(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns the first instance found of the service’s model filtered by the specified key word arguments or raises an 404 error if an instance with the specified id does not exist.

Parameters:**kwargs –

filter parameters
get(id)[source]¶

Returns an instance of the service’s model with the specified id. Returns None if an instance with the specified id does not exist.

Parameters:id – the instance id
get_all(*ids)[source]¶

Returns a list of instances of the service’s model with the specified ids.

Parameters:*ids –

instance ids
get_or_404(id)[source]¶

Returns an instance of the service’s model with the specified id or raises an 404 error if an instance with the specified id does not exist.

Parameters:id – the instance id
new(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a new, unsaved instance of the service’s model class.

Parameters:**kwargs –

instance parameters
save(model)[source]¶

Commits the model to the database and returns the model

Parameters:model – the model to save
update(model, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns an updated instance of the service’s model class.

Parameters:
  • model – the model to update
  • **kwargs –

    update parameters

Flask-Bootstrap extension instance

Flask-MongoKit extension instance
